Description:
Attention: First Home Buyers/Developers!
Located in a quiet street on the Central/East side within walking distance to St John's College, Primary Schools and the city centre, this solid family home has lots of options.
Features three large bedrooms, formal lounge and dining areas, kitchen/meals area and separate rumpus room.
The home is set on a block in excess of 800m2 and would be ideal for the construction of a second dwelling at the rear (STCA).
The home requires your decorative skills and imagination to put your own stamp on it.
A great opportunity to secure great position and potential!
BRING YOUR PAINTBRUSH!

Description:
PRIME LIVING IN SUPER CENTRAL LOCATION WITH NO BODY CORP!!
ENTRANCE IS THROUGH HIGH STREET.
Ray White is proud to present this fantastic opportunity for all First home buyers, downsizers and astute investors looking to be nestled in a highly sought-after and super central pocket of Dandenong. This well-maintained home is within a short walking distance to all amenities and provides the highly convenient and ideal lifestyle that you have been searching for.
Offering 2 very good-sized bedrooms with BIR, a spacious family area, second living area and dining/meals area. The delightful kitchen is equipped with gas cooking and an abundance of cupboard space. The main bathroom, separate toilet and laundry make up the interior of this lovely home.
Features of this home include: security shutters, ducted heating, airconditioning private courtyard, private backyard, own street frontage and private driveway.
It doesn't get more central then this walking distance to, Dandenong Market, Dandenong Plaza, Dandenong Hospital, Chisholm Institute, Multiple Pre-Schools, Primary Schools, High Schools, public transport, local shops and major arterial such as Princes Highway, Eastlink and Monash. This gem will not last long.
With the location and features like these, we would highly recommend you act soon before you see a SOLD sticker on the board!!
Call Ben Jusufi or Burak Gul for any further information!
*PHOTO I.D. REQUIRED UPON INSPECTION*
*All information contained therein is gathered from relevant third party sources. We cannot guarantee or give any warranty about the information provided. Interested parties must rely solely on their own enquiries.

Harcourts Dandenong is proud to present you with this fantastic opportunity for all First home buyers, downsizing and astute investors looking to be nestled in a highly sought-after pocket of Dandenong. This well-maintained home is within a short distance to all amenities and provides the convenient and ideal lifestyle you have been searching for.
This property features:

Additional features of the property includes a outdoor balcony and a allocated car park space.

Description:
Red hot You bet!
Sure to be a hit with a variety of buyers, this 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom 2 level property has everything you could possibly need. Surrounding by quality housing, opposite parks, this stunning 9 year young home ticks so many positive boxes!
Upon entry you can decide which spacious living area you'd prefer, the formal lounge or the massive family kitchen space that moves onto the back terrace from the beautiful glass doors. This wonderful indoor/outdoor entertaining space is sure to please those who like to interest guests or keep an eye on the children as they play outside.
Upstairs there's 3 bedrooms, all with expansive walk-in robes and plenty of room for parents and children alike.
Close to facilities including transport, Dandenong Central, schools and walking trails, this lovely opportunity will impress first home buyers, investors or even downsizers it has so much to offer.
Priced to sell, contact Andrew Ward for a private inspection
Terms: 10% deposit. Balance 60-90 days

Description:
Quality Home in Top Central Location!
Walk to the city centre, St John's College and parkland from this beautifully built family home set in a quiet court.
The home boasts dual driveways, one providing access to the large block of approximately 870m2, ideal for dual occupancy (STCA). The luxurious home features three double bedrooms, full ensuite and walk in robe to master, two huge living areas and central timber kitchen with stone benchtops.
There is a feeling of wide open spaces with lots of natural light. Other features include ducted heating, evaporative and split system air conditioning systems, roller shutters all around and oversized double garage. Lots of additional off-street parking.
This is a quality property in one of the best central locations.
TRY TO FIND BETTER!
***PHOTO ID REQUIRED FOR INSPECTION PLEASE***

Description:
Perfect first time investment!
Perfectly suited to the owner-occupier or smart investor only 4 on the block and there is no body corporate. This little gem has so much going for it already.
Step into an open plan lounge, kitchen and meals area with breakfast bar and gas wall heater, with its upright gas cooker and electric oven, ample cupboard space and room for a sizeable fridge which open onto a private backyard. The two bright bedrooms are carpeted and are served by a bathroom with combined laundry.
This unit is compact, but character, with single car accommodation and a current rental return of $1255 per month. Unbeatable location, just minutes from trains and buses, bustling Dandenong Market & Plaza, Dandenong Primary and Secondary and a short distance to Dandy Hospital.
This lovely unit is located close to public transport, shopping and Dandenong Hospital. It comprises 2 bedrooms with robes, central bathroom, open plan lounge/dining/kitchen, gas heating, ceiling fans, paved courtyard and single carport.

Description:
Incredible Townhouse and Only 4 Months New
On offer is this incredible architectural masterpiece, which has not long been completed and is perfect for first home buyers or upgraders with young families, downsizers, and is conveniently positioned.
Well designed and with a great finish, this impressive townhouse delivers the best in comfort in the area. Featuring:
- 2 Bedrooms with BIR
- Beautifully set up bathroom and 2 separate toilets
- Open plan kitchen with stainless steel appliances including gas cooktop and dishwasher along with a waterfall stone benchtop
- upstairs study nook
- Generous single carport with remote roller door
Also includes downlights throughout, floorboards downstairs, carpeted upstairs and bedrooms, tiled wet areas, ducted heating and reverse cycle air-conditioning. While outside is an easy to maintain backyard space for the kids or pets, with a shed, water tank and small sitting verandah.
All this is located close to kindergarten, schools, public transport, all major arterial roads for family convenience and Dandenong shopping centre within walking distance.

Description:
LIVE IN, OR INVEST, NEST!
Just realty international Dandenong is proud to offer this property to the Market.
This neat 3-bedroom 2-bathroom,1 toilet home is situated in a quiet court location only minutes from Dandenong Plaza. Located within walking distance of the fast paced, ever growing city of Dandenong. With this central location you are within walking distance to all the daily necessities, shops, schools and public transport.
Situated on a large 572m2 Land approx. great opportunity for those looking to invest in this perfect central location.
Features here include:
- 3 good sized bedrooms, all with built in robe one of the bedroom can be used as master, it has got access to toilet and bathroom from inside the bedroom.
-ducted heating
- big kitchen
- 2 car garage
- 2 bathrooms
- Large backyard
- Central location
- Close proximity to Princess hwy, Monash fwy and Eastlink
- And endless opportunities
Please feel free to come to any of our open for inspections and see it all for yourself or call Musa Mahir on 0418344043 for any further details.

Description:
Stunning house sized villa
Nestled in a great location this spacious single level villa is flooded with natural light and offers a wonderful open and airy ambience that's ideal for the young family, downsizer seeking low maintenance living or an astute investor.
Features include:
-Three spacious bedrooms, master with full ensuite and WIR
-Two separate living zones
-Ducted heating and split system
-Garage with workshop area
-Inactive owners corporation
Recently renovated with new floor coverings, new window furnishings, new stainless steel kitchen appliances, freshly painted and fully landscaped low maintenance garden. Just walking distance to Dandenong High School, Dandenong Hospital and public transport, this is one you don't want to miss! Call Dennis on 0438 341 066 for further details.

Description:
LOW MAINTENANCE ELEGANCE WITH NO BODY CORP!!
Ray White Dandenong is proud to present this fantastic opportunity for all First home buyers, downsizing and astute investors looking to be nestled in a highly sought-after pocket of Dandenong. This well-maintained home is within a short distance to all amenities and provides the convenient and ideal lifestyle you have been searching for.
For all investors out there, potential rental return is $300 - $330pw.
Offering 2 very good-sized bedrooms with BIR, a spacious family area, dining/meals area which is adjacent to the delightful kitchen equipped with electric cooking, dishwasher and an abundance of cupboard space. The main bathroom, separate toilet and laundry make up the interior of this lovely home.
This home also includes a spacious courtyard which is ideal for all year round entertaining.
Features include: Aircon, wall heater, courtyard, ceiling fans, roller shutters, single lockup garage and much more.
Located within a stone's-throw away from Dandenong South Primary School, Dandenong Station, Dandenong Bypass/Eastlink, Dandenong Creek walking trail, public transport and recreational facilities. This home is all but ready for you to make it your own.
With the location and features like these, we would highly recommend you act soon before you see a SOLD sticker on the board!!
Call Ben Jusufi or Burak Gul for any further information!
*PHOTO I.D. REQUIRED UPON INSPECTION*
*All information contained therein is gathered from relevant third party sources. We cannot guarantee or give any warranty about the information provided. Interested parties must rely solely on their own enquiries.
